column1: Master of Science in Information Technology
column2: The Hong Kong University of Science and Technology
column3: School of Engineering - Taught Postgraduate Programs
column5: The program is designed for those who wish to obtain broad-based and leading-edge skills in Information Technology and provides students with a strong theoretical foundation in all areas of IT. The courses give students insight into the application areas of all the subject materials that they study. The dual emphasis on a strong theoretical foundation and practical application, combined with extensive skill-set training, gives our students a broad array of expertise to draw on, enabling them to meet both the present and future needs of the IT industry.
column7: 2024/25 Fall intake - Full-time students: HK$220,000 (~US$28,200) - paid in 2 installments - Part-time students: HK$187,000 (~US$24,000) - paid in 4 installments  For other fees, please visit the university website.
